lines.english: Guess who’s back on the news
lines.irish: Tomhais cé atá ar ais ar an nuacht

lines.english: It’s your favourite Republican hoods
lines.irish: Is iad do buchaillí Poblachtacha is ansa leat

lines.english: It’s your fella with the Nike Air shoes
lines.irish: Is é do fhear leis na bróga Nike Air

lines.english: Two chains, two birds and we know what’s good
lines.irish: Dhá slabhra, dhá éan agus tá a fhios againn cén scéal

lines.english: Guess who's back to abuse
lines.irish: Tomhais cé atá ar ais chun masla a thabhairt

lines.english: Every solvent that I choose
lines.irish: Gach tuaslagán a roghnaím

lines.english: Two blues and a pint of stout
lines.irish: Dhá phiolla ghoirm agus pionta leanna dorcha

lines.english: And never you mind if it smells like trout, foc
lines.irish: Agus ná bac le boladh an bradáin, fócl

lines.english: Tomhas cé atá ag teacht i mo dhiaidh
lines.irish: Guess who's coming after me

lines.english: Ach Stalford agus an DUP
lines.irish: But Stalford and the DUP

lines.english: Gach lá, taobh amuigh de mo theach
lines.irish: Every day, outside my house

lines.english: "Go back to Dublin if you want to rap"
lines.irish: "Fill ar ais go Baile Átha Cliath más mian leat rapáil"

lines.english: Anois éist, I’m gonna say this once
lines.irish: Now listen, táim chun é seo a rá uair amháin

lines.english: Yous can all stay just don’t be cunts
lines.irish: Is féidir libh fanacht, ach ná bígí i bhur gcaimiléirí

lines.english: And don’t be runnin' round like silly old Tans
lines.irish: Agus ná bí ag rith thart cosúil le Sean-Tans seafóideacha

lines.english: Just take these yokes and we’ll go for a dance
lines.irish: Tógaigí na piollaí seo agus rachaimid ag rince

lines.english: Go for a dance, go for a dance
lines.irish: Téigh ag rince, téigh ag rince

lines.english: Go for a dance, go for a dance
lines.irish: Téigh ag rince, téigh ag rince

lines.english: Bhí an DUP harassin' me
lines.irish: The DUP were harassing me

lines.english: But now we’re all on the yokes and it’s startin' to be
lines.irish: Ach anois táimid uilig ar na piollaí agus tá sé ag éirí

lines.english: A good night out, they forgot all about
lines.irish: Oíche mhaith amuigh, rinne siad dearmad go hiomlán ar

lines.english: The time that I said something like ‘Brits Out’
lines.irish: An uair a dúirt mé rud éigin cosúil le 'Amach leis na Briotanaigh'

lines.english: Arlene’s throwing shapes half a yoke nearly killed her
lines.irish: Tá Arlene ag cur cora, ba bheag nár mharaigh leathphillín í

lines.english: Jeffrey Donaldson’s lost all his filters
lines.irish: Tá gach scagaire caillte ag Jeffrey Donaldson

lines.english: "Seo duit mate, take two sticks"
lines.irish: "Here you go, a chara, glac dhá phiolla"

lines.english: He got me in a headlock and gave me a kiss
lines.irish: Chuir sé mé i ngreim muiníl agus thug póg dom

lines.english: And now Christy Stalford’s having the craic
lines.irish: Agus anois tá Christy Stalford ag baint sult as

lines.english: Showing everyone his old tattoo on his back
lines.irish: Ag taispeáint a sheantatú ar a dhroim do gach duine

lines.english: Arlene says "Relax or you’ll get sacked"
lines.irish: Deir Arlene "Lig do scíth nó brisfear thú as do phost"

lines.english: Dúirt mé "tóg go bog é’, things get weird when you're whacked
lines.irish: I said "take it easy", éiríonn rudaí aisteach nuair atá tú ar na drugaí

lines.english: Brits out for the night and we landed in Thompson’s
lines.irish: Amach leis na Briotanaigh don oíche agus shroicheamar Thompson’s

lines.english: Told Donaldson to double drop to see what happens
lines.irish: Dúirt mé le Donaldson dhá cheann a thógáil le feiceáil cad a tharlaíonn

lines.english: Sammy Wilson got knocked back at the door
lines.irish: Níor lig siad Sammy Wilson isteach sa doras

lines.english: And now he’s out the front in bad form
lines.irish: Agus anois tá sé amuigh os comhair i drochghiúmar

lines.english: Scoth na hoíche, neart yokes le hithe
lines.irish: Night of nights, plenty of pills to eat

lines.english: 'nois tá mála de fiche, críochnaithe
lines.irish: Now there's a bag of twenty, finished

lines.english: These E’s are sweet, they’re sweet E's
lines.irish: Tá na E seo milis, is milis iad

lines.english: I’m eatin 'em like sweeties, Mála mór cola bottles agus mála meanies
lines.irish: Táim á n-ithe cosúil le milseáin, mála mór buidéal cola agus mála meanies

lines.english:
Get your Brits out, get your Brits out, get your Brits out
We’re on a mad one
lines.irish:
Faigh amach do Bhriotanaigh, faigh amach do Bhriotanaigh, faigh amach do Bhriotanaigh
Táimid ar mire

lines.english:
Get your Brits out, get your Brits out, get your Brits out
We’re on a mad one!

lines.english: Ar ais ag an teach and things are getting crusty
lines.irish: Back at the house and things are getting messy

lines.english: Arlene ar mo chlé and she’s getting touchy
lines.irish: Arlene’s on my left and she’s getting flirty

lines.english: Must be, just mar gheall ar na yokes
lines.irish: Must be, just because of the pills

lines.english: 'Cause she whispered in my ear ‘I like to be choked’
lines.irish: Mar a dúirt sí go ciúin liom ‘Is maith liom a bheith stróicthe’

lines.english: And I boked right into her face
lines.irish: Agus rinne mé urlacan díreach ina héadan

lines.english: 'Cause the room was spinning all over the place
lines.irish: Mar bhí an seomra ag rothlú timpeall orm

lines.english: I couldn’t stand, couldn’t sit but I kept her lit
lines.irish: Níorbh fhéidir liom seasamh ná suí ach choinnigh mé ar aghaidh léi

lines.english: And now my best mate is a distinguished Brit
lines.irish: Agus anois is Briotanach clúiteach é mo chara is fearr

lines.english: We’re at the afters and it’s a disaster
lines.irish: Táimid ag an gcóisir i ndiaidh agus is tubaiste é

lines.english: Cunts are talkin' politics, there's a lack of a laughter
lines.irish: Tá daoine ag caint faoi pholaitíocht, gan gáire ar bith le cloisteáil

lines.english: Skaggin' out on the sofa, Arlene’s tinn
lines.irish: Ag imeacht as a meabhair ar an tolg, tá Arlene tinn

lines.english: Paro off her head, she believes she’s sinned
lines.irish: Ar mire ina hintinn, síleann sí go ndearna sí peaca

lines.english: Donaldson has started with his homophobic chat
lines.irish: Thosaigh Donaldson lena chuid cainte homafóibeach

lines.english: So everyone has started on him that’s enough of that
lines.irish: Mar sin thosaigh gach duine ag tabhairt air, sin go leor de sin

lines.english: Stalford’s lickin' coke off a plate
lines.irish: Tá Stalford ag lapaire cóicín ó phláta
